about_the_game:
"The oldest and most powerful human emotion is fear."

"A Horror Game for Cowards" is a short horror game designed for those who are too cowardly to play horror games and for horror lovers looking for different experiences. The game features cartoon-style graphics, a narrator and popular horror elements in a safe experience. It also includes Easter eggs and 2 different endings.

Welcome to Brave Science!

You'll take part in an experiment on fear at a science facility called Brive Science, with different themes, puzzles and mini-games. You'll be accompanied by an AI model called Cowardice Overcoming Assistant, who will explain in detail what's waiting for you to feel safe every step of the way. There will also be animatronic creatures inside, providing you with a frightening but safe experience. The scientists working at Brave Science promise that you will leave feeling extremely brave (no guarantees).



The average time to complete the game in linear flow is 45 minutes. Different endings and Easter Eggs can extend this time.


Is that everything?

That's enough to know for now. But, of course, more awaits those who like a detailed research inside.

Basically, inside you will find;
-Puzzles and chases
-Very cute cartoon graphics
-A highly reliable AI narrator
-and test rooms prepared in different themes
